StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateCollegePro.lePFT]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CollegePro.lePFTID uniqueiden..er, @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode int, @FiscalYear int, @PullUpLoca.on varchar(100), @CrunchLoca.on varchar(100), @RunRoute varchar(80), @UserLogin varchar(50), @PushUpLoca.on varchar(100) = null
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
--DECLARE @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er Select @CollegePro.leID = CollegePro.leID FROM [USMC].CollegePro.le cp where School_Code = @SchoolCode and FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].[CollegePro.lePFT] where CollegePro.lePFTID = @CollegePro.lePFTID and @CollegePro.lePFTID IS NOT NULL)
-- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.lePFT] SET
--Cannot update [CollegePro.leID] once it is inserted --[CollegePro.leID] = @CollegePro.leID
[PullUpLoca.on] = @PullUpLoca.on, [PushUpLoca.on] = @PushUpLoca.on, [CrunchLoca.on] = @CrunchLoca.on, [RunRoute] = @RunRoute, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin, [UpdateDate] = GetDate()
WHERE CollegePro.lePFTID = @CollegePro.lePFTID and @CollegePro.lePFTID IS NOT NULL END
--ELSE PROCEED WITH INSERT ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.lePFT] ([CollegePro.lePFTID],[CollegePro.leID], [PullUpLoca.on], [PushUpLoca.on], [CrunchLoca.on], [RunRoute],[UserLogin], [UpdateDate])
VALUES (@CollegePro.lePFTID,@CollegePro.leID, @PullUpLoca.on, @PushUpLoca.on, @CrunchLoca.on, @RunRoute, @UserLogin,GetDate())
END --- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
